info.name: api_server
info.description: Kinetic Request CE API Web Application

info.name: api_username
info.description: Name of user account that has permission to use the API

info.name: space_slug
info.description: Slug of the Space where the User will be created.

info.name: jdbc_database_id
info.description: The JDBC Id from the connection string for the database being used. ie. (oracle, sqlserver, postgresql, mysql).

info.name: host
info.description: IP address or hostname of the SQL reporting database server.

info.name: port
info.description: Port number the SQL server is listening on.

info.name: database_name
info.description: SQL database name used for storing CE submissions.

info.name: database_identifier_size
info.description: Max database identifier size. Not required to set for MSSQL, Oracle or PostgreSQL. Default for MSSQL is 128, Oracle 30, and PostgreSQL is 64.

info.name: user
info.description: Username used to authenticate to the SQL server. Must have table creation and modification rights.

info.name: password
info.description: Password for the SQL user account.

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
